function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of uv light for vehicle cabin cleaning may not be effective in eliminating all contagious pathogens","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality and occupancy in public transport","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in in-cabin sensing and analytics in vehicles","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recurring natural disasters earthquakes, floods, droughts","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective surveillance system for covid-19 containment and monitoring.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Installation of sensors for enhanced sensing coverage","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Deployment of new technologies in urban environments may lead to disruptions in infrastructure and services","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of insufficient social distancing measures leading to potential virus spread","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective disinfection and cleaning leading to virus spread","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misidentification of high-risk areas for disinfection","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality due to pollutants and contaminants","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation, indoor air quality, and lighting impacting transmission of covid-19","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for iot technologies in buildings due to covid-19","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption due to covid-19 confinement","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased time spent at home leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of iot devices in smart homes may lead to a higher density of interconnected devices, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not followed.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of technological infrastructure for effective test and trace applications","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of iot and related technologies in healthcare sector","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confinement measures and tracking of covid-19 patients using gps and other tools","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated deployment of iot technologies in healthcare","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and data security risks associated with the collection and transmission of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud systems","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards technology-driven future may lead to increased cyber security risks and vulnerabilities, especially with the collection and sharing of personal and sensitive data for remote transactions and interactions.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective ai-based approaches for eradicating pandemics","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot data sharing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Barriers in adopting iot-based healthcare","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data security in iot devices used for covid-19 management","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot technology for disease management and control","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on iot in different sectors impacted by covid-19 may overlook specific health risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stricter cleaning and tracking requirements for businesses","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of indicators in global green building certification and rating systems to address pandemics","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited consideration of certification and rating systems and focus on environmental and social sustainability only","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to virus propagation","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient energy use and lack of backup energy sources","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of response to wastewater management wwm1, wwm2, wwm3 in the health & safety category","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of pathogens through wastewater and waste management","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor and activity spaces leading to poor mental health","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps in casbee’s response to prevention of virus propagation indicators pvp1, pvp2, and pvp3","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missing indicators for water management in the environmental resources category","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Partially addressed indicators in personal comfort and local services categories","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prevention of virus propagation indicators missing","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health indicators missing","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Air quality indicators missing","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of viruses due to surface contact in the building","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to outdoor spaces and greenery","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe drinking water and wastewater management","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of virus propagation prevention indicators in leed standards","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missing waste management and mental health subcategories in leed standards","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coverage for energy use and comfort indicators in leed standards","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive pandemic-sustainable indicators","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on internationally recognized sustainability systems may not fully address pandemic-specific indicators and risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
